mapper.select: select count(*) from TRAFFIC where num > #{maxNum}
select content, count(*) as num from TRAFFIC group by content ORDER BY num desc;
select time_h as num, COUNT(*) as content FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(endTime, '%H') AS time_h FROM traffic WHERE DATE_FORMAT(endTime, '%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE())tmp GROUP BY time_h
SELECT * FROM traffic WHERE date_format(endTime, '%Y-%m-%d %T') >= #{start} && date_format(endTime, '%Y-%m-%d %T') <= #{end}
